Post-Match Reflections: The most important thing is still to come. We hope to reach the final, said Rodriguez.
I am very proud of my players, of what they have achieved in this Copa América, said Panama coach Thomas Christiansen.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia's last defeat came in a 1-0 loss to Argentina in February 2022.
The win extends Colombia's unbeaten run to 27 matches.
